professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with over 6 years of expertise in Data Migration, Performance Tuning, Backup/Recovery, Security, and various database management tasks. Seeking to further develop skills in a dynamic environment.

key_responsibilities: Developed Backup strategies and Recovery solutions.
Analyzed physical model and applied best practices for schema design.
Performed Performance Tuning using SQL Profiler and Database Engine tuning advisor.
Assisted with capacity planning and storage space management.
Provided database Development support including query analysis and optimization.
Performed Data Import and Export Operations using SSIS.
Monitored and maintained database performance using System monitor
Migrated On-premises databases to SQL Server Azure.
Implemented Security Management policy including creating and managing roles
Configuring and monitoring AlwaysOn availability groups
Tracking and managing inventory records for Carter's DC.
Assisting with product movement and stock replenishment.
Overseeing damage control and minimizing stock loss.
Assisting in order fulfillment and warehouse operations.
Verifying product location accuracy using scanners.
Ensuring a safe working environment by maintaining compliance with safety protocols.
